sub_concepts.name: Planets
sub_concepts.definition: Celestial bodies that orbit the Sun

sub_concepts.name: Asteroids
sub_concepts.definition: Small rocky bodies that orbit the Sun

sub_concepts.name: Comets
sub_concepts.definition: Small icy bodies that orbit the Sun

sub_concepts.name: Dwarf Planets
sub_concepts.definition: Celestial bodies that are not considered full-fledged planets
